channel.title: misc on Emiliano
channel.description: Recent content in misc on Emiliano

item.title: First
item.description: It is said that one should have a creative outlet, a piece that you can take and show everybody. As intimate as I think it is, blogging sounds perfect for me. I’ve never, ever, been creative in the artsy way, such as drawing or painting. Yup, I have in the past made fun of people that have in their social media handle, “WRITER, BLOGGER, BEST SELLING ARTIST” but I can now appriciate on how it makes one feel and why it’s important to share that, no matter how miniscule.
